title: A low-cost assay for hydrogen peroxide using sewage sludge-based carbon nanodots
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1688-1696
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00197D, Paper
Xiaonan Liu, Long Wang, Yuling Ye, Zhicheng Pan, Aijie Wang, Wei Huang
In this work, sewage sludge is considered for the first time as a colorimetric detection probe for H2O2. This work is beneficial to the management and resource utilization of sewage sludge and the visual detection of H2O2.
